channel.title: BLOOZECAST
channel.description: Welcome to Bloozecast! Bloozecast is a free 30 minute program featuring great blues, soul, swing and funk by great artists. Traditional, classic and contemporary. Download by clicking the subscribe button or listen now! Hosted by Jeff Sismelich, singer with Chicago’s leading Blues Brothers Tribute and Show Band, The Blooze Brothers! Tell us what you think. Make requests, tell your music-loving friends! New programs added every couple of weeks. Thanks for listening!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to Bloozecast! Bloozecast is a free 30 minute program featuring great blues, soul, swing and funk by great artists. Traditional, classic and contemporary. Download by clicking the subscribe button or listen now! Hosted by Jeff Sismelich, singe

item.title: BLOOZECAST #6 - JERRY & ISAAC: SOUL MEN
item.description: Bloozecast examines the impact of R&B and Soul Legends Jerry Wexler and Isaac Hayes. Can ya dig it?
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Sismelich
item.itunes:subtitle: Bloozecast examines the impact of R&B and Soul Legends Jerry Wexler and Isaac Hayes. Can ya dig it?
item.itunes:summary: Bloozecast examines the impact of R&B and Soul Legends Jerry Wexler and Isaac Hayes. Can ya dig it?

item.title: BLOOZECAST #5 - SUMMERTIME BLUES
item.description: Summer’s nearing it’s end! Let’s enjoy what’s left on Bloozecast!
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Sismelich
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer’s nearing it’s end! Let’s enjoy what’s left on Bloozecast!
item.itunes:summary: Summer’s nearing it’s end! Let’s enjoy what’s left on Bloozecast!

item.title: BLOOZECAST #4 - RED, WHITE & BLUES
item.description: Featuring all the things that make America great. Freedom, liberty & good barbecue! Celebrate the holiday with Bloozecast!
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Sismelich
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring all the things that make America great. Freedom, liberty & good barbecue! Celebrate the holiday with Bloozecast!
item.itunes:summary: Featuring all the things that make America great. Freedom, liberty & good barbecue! Celebrate the holiday with Bloozecast!

item.title: BLOOZECAST #3 - REMEMBERING BO DIDDLEY
item.description: Blues Legend and Rock ‘N Roll Pioneer, Bo Diddley, is remembered through his music. His original recordings and cover versions of his vast catalog are presented. Bo knows Rock ‘N Roll!
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Sismelich
item.itunes:subtitle: Blues Legend and Rock ‘N Roll Pioneer, Bo Diddley, is remembered through his music. His original recordings and cover versions of his vast catalog are presented. Bo knows Rock ‘N Roll!
item.itunes:summary: Blues Legend and Rock ‘N Roll Pioneer, Bo Diddley, is remembered through his music. His original recordings and cover versions of his vast catalog are presented. Bo knows Rock ‘N Roll!

item.title: BLOOZECAST #2 - BLUES FEST 2008
item.description: This show features some of the many great artists who will be performing at this year’s Chicago Blues Fest. Click here to see the full schedule. See you at the Fest!
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Sismelich
item.itunes:subtitle: This show features some of the many great artists who will be performing at this year’s Chicago Blues Fest. Click here to see the full schedule. See you at the Fest!
